diff_analysis.evidence: In the NEW code, Django SyncGraphQLView and AsyncGraphQLView dispatch methods are decorated with @csrf_exempt, disabling CSRF protection. Reverting to the OLD code removes @csrf_exempt, re-enabling Django’s built-in CSRF protection. Therefore, the OLD code was more secure with respect to CSRF and not vulnerable to CWE-352; the vulnerability is introduced by the NEW code, not present in the OLD code.
